itemData.name: Winterfin Horn of Distress
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Winterfin Horn of Distress
Binds when picked up
Use: Calls forth a Winterfin First Responder to fight at your side. Using the horn will consume it. (5 minutes cooldown)
"Only works in Borean Tundra, Howling Fjord, and Dragonblight."
1 Charge
